bibl.title: [Michigan Papyri. Volume X.] Documentary Papyri from the Michigan Collection.
bibl.seg: Browne Gerald M., [Michigan Papyri. Volume X.] Documentary Papyri from the Michigan Collection. (American Studies in Papyrology. 6.)
Toronto, A.M. Hakkert, 1970, 4°, x-98 pp. et VIII pll.

C.R. par Zbigniew Borkowski, JJurP 18 (1974) pp. 272-276 (concerne aussi le P. Mich. XI). - J.A.S. Evans, Phoenix 26 (1972) p. 209. - Marcel Hombert, ChrEg 46 (1971) No. 91, pp. 190-195. - Naphtali Lewis, AJP 94 (1973) pp. 227-230. - Ernest-Ludwig Missler, Gnomon 44 (1972) pp. 467-472. - José O'Callaghan, StPap 10 (1971) p. 138. - Peter J. Parsons, JEA 59 (1973) p. 272. - Hans-Albert Rupprecht, ZSav 89 (1972) pp. 400-406 (concerne aussi P. Mich. XI). - Fritz Uebel, BibO 30 (1973) pp. 419-424.
